entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 1:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
